titles.title: American Entrepreneurs First Act of 2025
American Entrepreneurs First Act
American Entrepreneurs First Act of 2025

To require the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to require an applicant for certain loans of the Administration to provide certain citizenship status documentation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute by Voice Vote.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Small Business. H. Rept. 119-112.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 83.

committee.name: House Small Business
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
